template_description: Standard template for service_architecture.json files based on UAF definitions
purpose: Binds atomic nuclei together, ensuring the stability of matter.

interfaces.name: Strong Nuclear Interaction
interfaces.description: The strong nuclear force is the fundamental force that binds protons and neutrons together in atomic nuclei, overcoming the repulsive electromagnetic force between protons.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strong_interaction, https://www.britannica.com/science/strong-force
